fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Revenue Year-over-Year Comparison
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to compare two time periods side-by-side in a visualization.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Compare our revenue this year versus last year, broken down by month. Show both years on the same chart so I can see the comparison.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart comparing two years of revenue data
Two distinct series for current year and previous year
Months are aligned for easy comparison
Chart makes it easy to see year-over-year changes
